usage.cn: 像风灌进回忆一样痛被吹散 ，爱却在不知不觉中着了凉。
usage.eng: Like the wind dunk as pain memories were blown, but love is in imperceptible in the cold.

usage.cn: 刻下爱的见证的小树，已长成大树。 而我们狂热的恋情，早随风飘散。 小小的印记，变成巨大的伤痕。 风起时，我听见整个森林的叹息……
usage.eng: The sapling that bears our mark of love has grown into a big tree, but our once fervent love is lost forever in the wind. The little mark has become a scar. When the wind blows, we hear the sigh of the forest...
